name: The Heist
summary: The Heist is a free racing game. You're a professional getaway driver who does freelance work for the mob, bank robbers, and anyone else looking to pull off a quick job. Don't think too much about the morals, ethics, or legalities of this kind of work. All that matters is that if you pull it off you'll get paid in fat stacks of cash. Cash you can use to upgrade your engine, your wheels, your steering, and even your look.
